# File lib/ruby-debug-base.rb, line 206
  def debug_method(meth)
    old_meth = "__debugee_#{meth}"
    old_meth = "#{$1}_set" if old_meth =~ /^(.+)=$/
    alias_method old_meth.to_sym, meth
    class_eval "def \#{meth}(*args, &block)\nDebugger.start do\ndebugger 2\n\#{old_meth}(*args, &block)\nend\nend\n"
  end
